member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS structure stores a single DNS server address in a linked list of DNS server addresses for a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS.Alignment
member.summary: Reserved. Used by the compiler to align the structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next DNS server address structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SERVER_ADDRESS.Address
member.summary: The IP address for this DNS server entry. This member can be an IPv6 address or an IPv4 address.
